definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: hide, conceal (NH id., der. species; Targum [[סְתַר]] Pa. Ithpa., Syr. star Pe. Pt. pass., chiefly Pa. Ithpa., id.; Ar. stara veil, conceal, hide, Lane:1304; Eth. satara: (rare) Di:354);—

be hid, concealed, esp. fig. of escaping God's notice, c. [[מִפְּנֵי]] pers. Ge 4:14 (J), [[מִלִּפְנֵי]] Je 16:17, [[מִנֶּגֶד עֵינַי]] Am 9:3, [[מֵעֵינַי]] Is 65:16, Ho 13:14 (subj. [[נׁחַם]], i.e. I will not repent, change my purpose of judgment), [[מִן]] Ps 38:10, Is 40:27; fr. heat of sun Ps 19:7 (i.e. it penetrates everywhere); fr. birds Job 28:21 (of place of wisdom); recipr. [[אִישׁ מֵרֵעֵהוּ]] ´[[נִסּ]] Ge 31:49 (J) when we are hidden each from the other (i.e. separated); abs. Nu 5:13, Job 3:23 (whose way is hid sc. from himself), Zep 2:3 (i.e. escape ´[[י]]'s judgment); pt. hidden, secret things, in gen. De 29:28; of sins Ps 19:13.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Imv. fs. [[סַתְּרִי]] Is 16:3 carefully hide (i.e. shelter) the outcasts (Moab speaks to Zion).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. fs. [[אַהֲבָה מְסֻתָָּרֶת]] Pr 27:5 love carefully concealed.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּסְתַּתָָּר]] Is 29:14; Pt. [[מִסְתַּתֵּר]] 1Sa 23:19 + 3 t.;—hide oneself carefully, of David's taking refuge with ([[עִם]]) Ziphites 1Sa 23:19 = Ps 54:2 (title), in ([[בְּ]]) a hill 1Sa 26:1; ´[[אֵל מ]] Is 45:15 a God that completely hides himself.

a person from ([[מִפְּנֵי]]) enemy 2Ki 11:2 = 2Ch 22:11; subj. ´[[י]], c. [[מִן]] Ps 64:3, abs. Je 36:26; hide anything from ([[מִן]]) one 1Sa 20:2, a thing, in gen., Pr 25:2; anything (fr. ´[[י]]; [[מִן]] in ‖ cl.) Is 29:15; in gen. = shelter a person Job 14:13, c. [[בְּ]] loc. (subj. ´[[י]]) Ps 17:8, Ps 27:5, Ps 31:21 (all metaph.); toil ([[עָמָל]]), [[מֵעֵינׇ֑י]] Job 3:10; commands fr., [[מִן]] pers. (subj. ´[[י]]) Ps 119:19; hide one as arrow in quiver Is 49:2.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: ´[[י]] hides his face from ([[מִן]] pers.), i.e. withdraws his favour, Mic 3:4, Is 8:17, Is 54:8, Is 64:6, De 31:17, De 32:20, Je 33:5, Ez Eze 39:23, Eze 39:24, Eze 39:29, Ps 13:2, Ps 22:25, Ps 27:9, Ps 69:18, Ps 88:15, Ps 102:3, Ps 143:7; abs. De 31:18, Job 13:24, Job 34:29, Ps 30:8 cf. Ps 104:29, Ps 44:25; [[פָּנִים]] om. Is 57:17; cf. Is 59:2 your sins have hidden (his) face from ([[מִן]]) you; of hiding one's face from ([[מִן]]) shame, i.e. avoiding it Is 50:6 (of servant of ´[[י]]).
